name: Flowers for Yuyuko
description:
Help Youmu gather flowers for the ghost princess! A ten stage puzzle game. There's no background music yet so you'll have to bring your own. ^_^

The Jam Version crashes before you can see the ending, so here's a screenshot if you missed it: https://i.imgur.com/t0s6Ors.png

Made in 72 hours for the Touhou Fan Game Jam 6 . This is a fan work of the Touhou Project.

Default Controls:

  • Move:  Arrow Keys / WASD / Gamepad Left Stick
  • Select:  Enter / Z / J / Gamepad A
  • Cancel: Escape / X / K / Gamepad B
  • Reset:  R / Gamepad Back
  • Pause:  Escape / Gamepad Start
